description: This is an unusual method to download files. It starts a browser headless and downloads a file from a location. This can be used by threat actors to download files.
author: Sreeman
Florian Roth
name: File Download with Headless Browser
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\msedge.exe OR *\\chrome.exe) AND process.command_line.text:*\-\-headless* AND process.command_line.text:*dump\-dom* AND process.command_line.text:*http*)
